name: Verse ◦ Vow ∞
simple_desc: Summons memosprite Demiurge, causes it to immediately gain 1 extra turn, and activates all teammates' Ultimate. Then, enters the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state and gains Enhanced Basic ATK. Increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's CRIT Rate, and deploys the Zone effect from Skill with no duration limit.
desc:
Summons memosprite Demiurge, causes it to immediately gain 1 extra turn, and activates all teammates' Ultimate. Then, enters the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state. Enhances Basic ATK to "To Love and Tomorrow ♪" and can only use this Basic ATK. Increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's CRIT Rate by #3[i]%, and deploys the Zone effect from Skill with no duration limit.
Can only be used once per battle. Demiurge's initial Max HP equals to #1[i]% of Cyrene's Max HP.
